name: Zheng He
what_did:
Zheng He led giant ships on long voyages across Asia and Africa.
He brought gifts, traded goods, and made friends with other lands.
His fleet was so big it amazed people around the world.
why_matters:
Zheng He showed the power and curiosity of ancient China.
He helped connect faraway places through peaceful journeys.
His travels proved that exploration could be about friendship too.
